Title: The Departed
Description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other in this thrilling crime drama set in Boston.

Title: Memento
Description: A man with short-term memory loss uses notes and tattoos to hunt for the man he thinks killed his wife.

Title: American Beauty
Description: A suburban family goes through a series of challenges as they confront issues of conformity, rebellion, and identity.

Title: Amadeus
Description: The life, success, and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart as told by Antonio Salieri, who was secretly jealous of his genius.

Title: A Beautiful Mind
Description: The life story of John Nash, a brilliant but asocial mathematician who overcomes schizophrenia to achieve great things.

Title: Her
Description: In a near future, a lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system designed to meet his every need.

Title: Road to Perdition
Description: A mob hitman becomes a father figure to an orphaned boy in this stylish and atmospheric crime drama.

Title: American Psycho
Description: A wealthy New York City investment banking executive hides his alternate psychopathic ego from his friends and co-workers.

Title: Waves
Description: A profound exploration of love, loss, and the healing power of music, set against the backdrop of a multi-generational African-American family.

Title: Dark Waters
Description: A corporate defense attorney takes on an environmental lawsuit against a chemical company that exposes a lengthy history of pollution.

Title: Just Mercy
Description: The story of Bryan Stevenson, a defense attorney who takes on the case of an African-American man wrongfully imprisoned for murder.

Title: The Favourite
Description: In early 18th-century England, two cousins vie for the attention of Queen Anne in a darkly comedic tale of intrigue and betrayal.

Title: Nocturnal Animals
Description: A successful art-gallery owner is haunted by her ex-husband's novel, a violent thriller she interprets as a symbolic revenge tale.

Title: The Judge
Description: A successful lawyer returns to his hometown for his mother's funeral only to discover that his estranged father, the town's judge, is suspected of murder.

Title: Love and Mercy
Description: The life and career of Brian Wilson, the reclusive musician who led the Beach Boys, is explored in this heartfelt biopic.

Title: The Last Duel
Description: King Charles VI declares that Knight Jean de Carrouges settle his dispute with his squire by challenging him to a duel.

Title: The French Dispatch
Description: An anthology of short stories based on Wes Anderson's love letter to journalism.

Title: In the Heights
Description: A musical drama about a young girl growing up in Washington Heights, a vibrant community on the brink of change.

Title: Snowden
Description: The story of Edward Snowden, who leaked classified information from the NSA and became one of the most controversial figures in modern history.

Title: Okja
Description: A young girl risks everything to save her best friend, a genetically engineered pig, from a powerful corporation in this heartfelt and emotional adventure.
